author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS EXPECTED ACROSS BERMUDA, THE NORTHERN CARIBBEAN, THE BAHAMAS, AND THE U.S. EAST COAST THROUGH THE WEEK...
summary: ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS EXPECTED ACROSS BERMUDA, THE NORTHERN CARIBBEAN, THE BAHAMAS, AND THE U.S. EAST COAST THROUGH THE WEEK... As of 5:00 AM AST Tue Sep 30 the center of Humberto was located near 31.6, -69.4 with movement NNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 972 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS EXPECTED ACROSS BERMUDA, THE NORTHERN CARIBBEAN, THE BAHAMAS, AND THE U.S. EAST COAST THROUGH THE WEEK... As of 5:00 AM AST Tue Sep 30 the center of Humberto was located near 31.6, -69.4 with movement NNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 972 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
